name: F-Zero RPG 3: Bounty Hunter X
description:
The third and possibly final game in the series. This is the biggest game yet. This time, Captain Falcon and friends travel the universe and befriend many different Nintendo characters. I took my time with this one. Hope you enjoy it. The feedback I get will determine if a fourth game will be made.
Features:
13 playable characters including Falcon, Jody, and many iconic Nintendo Characters
Over 150 enemies and bosses
Over 200 unique spells and skills
Upbeat F-Zero Music, and music from many Nintendo games
Dozens of secrets
F-Zero races
And more
